content: भाज् {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> To divide, distribute; see भज् {%<ab>caus.</ab>%}

भाज् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (Usually at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) {@--1@} Sharing or participating in, liable to; पाप° <ls>Ku. 5. 83</ls>; दोष° guilty. {@--2@} Having, enjoying, possessing, obtaining; सुख°, रिक्थ°. {@--3@} Entitled to. {@--4@} Feeling, experiencing, being sensible of. {@--5@} Devoting oneself to. {@--6@} Living in, inhabiting, dwelling in; as in कुहरभाज्, दरीभाज् &c. {@--7@} Going or resorting to, seeking. {@--8@} Worshipping. {@--9@} Falling to the lot of. {@--10@} What must be done, a duty (कर्तव्य); <ls>Bk. 3. 21.</ls>
